mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER (u_email, u_pw, u_phone_number, u_nickname, u_expire_member, u_is_admin, u_profile_pic) values (#{u_email}, #{u_pw}, #{u_phone_number}, #{u_nickname}, #{u_expire_member}, #{u_is_admin}, #{u_profile_pic})
mapper.select: SELECT u_id, u_email, u_pw, u_phone_number, u_nickname, u_expire_member, u_is_admin, u_profile_pic FROM MEMBER WHERE #{useremail} like u_email
